上學期可以修關老師的統計，下學期請換課，學習上會更紮實。例如老師期中前就把所有基礎統計（到直線性的多變量分析）教完了，進度很快。課程說會碰到R，但其實還是要自學，因為老師和助教可能會，但執行上和能力上不太會教。

I found the meterial some weeks quite too many. Prof. sometimes didn't finish the lecture all of slides. Therefore it hard to finish the homework on  time. Due to the meaterial quite difficults and it take times for me to study after class.

Please don't laugh at students when they get answers wrong; give students written (not verbal) criteria of expectations to be met for projects before projects; give students feedback after their presentation or give a time limit.
In the R part I think it was too fast, so I don't understand most of the thing. It would be better if prof. slow a bit down.
Very difficult course, did not understand how and why do we have use R. Don't include programming.
Statistics II was too difficult compared to Statistics I.
I find that the course is very hard to understand and digest so I wish the explanation professor gave us should be clearer and different teaching style
Sometimes the lecture was not well setup for online classes. The screen wasn't shared and the volume was muted

The professor is very knowledgeable and provides very useful teaching materials. I love the textbook for the class. It is a shame that other classmates don't enjoy statistics, because then there is less of an opportunity for mentoring.
